name: Albert's Big Meal
description:
Albert went a little overboard with his most recent meal and can't even slither to get back to his den. Using his long neck and currently substantial girth he has to grapple, swing, and climb his way back home.

Controls: 

Left click to extend your neck and hold it to grab onto objects. 

Hold right click or the Space Key to pull your body towards you head.

Solo dev. Joshua Harris, Chicken Waffle, Austin

Thanks to Unity, FreeSounds.Com, Kenney.nl, and 1001FreeFonts.com for the assets and tools I had no ability or time to make myself.
